channel.title: Updating the world map
channel.description:
[center]Hi I was wondering if its possible to get the latest runescape world map to put in a client?
I mean silab did it with items so why can we do it with the world map.
Anybody who reads post your opinion or help :)
Thanks[/center]

item.title: Updating the world map
item.dc:creator: @The_Prodigyscape The Prodigyscape
item.description:
@The_Prodigyscape wrote:

Or maybe…
We could create a type of bomb that doesnt hurt electronics and detonate it inside jagex HQ and steal their technology???
Nahhhh…

Umm I know it would have something to do with the cache is like all I would know…
This is a good idea because the modern edgeville would be sweet…
Allong with a few other new things they have made.

Read full topic

item.title: Updating the world map
item.dc:creator: @imjammy780 imjammy780
item.description:
@imjammy780 wrote:

i think it has something to do with the jagex cache file, so if there was a way to make the client read the world map from the file maybe we could do it…

Read full topic
